name: Battle Master Maneuvers

entries.name: Ambush
entries.trigger: when you make a Dexterity (Stealth) check or an Initiative roll
effects: expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the roll
limits: you must not have the Incapacitated condition

entries.name: Bait and Switch
entries.trigger: when you're within 5 feet of a creature on your turn
effects: expend one Superiority Die and switch places with the creature after spending at least 5 feet of movement
this movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks
roll the Superiority Die; until the start of your next turn, you or the other creature (your choice) gains a bonus to AC equal to the number rolled
limits: the creature must be willing and not have the Incapacitated condition

entries.name: Commander's Strike
entries.trigger: when you take the Attack action on your turn
effects: replace one of your attacks to direct a willing creature who can see or hear you to strike
the creature can immediately use its Reaction to make one attack with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike
on a hit, add the Superiority Die to the attack damage roll
limits: the creature must be willing and able to take a Reaction

entries.name: Commanding Presence
entries.trigger: when you make a Charisma (Intimidation, Performance, or Persuasion) check
effects: expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the roll

entries.name: Disarming Attack
entries.trigger: when you hit a creature with an attack roll
effects: expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack damage roll
the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or drop one object of your choice that it is holding; the object lands in its space

entries.name: Distracting Strike
entries.trigger: when you hit a creature with an attack roll
effects: expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack damage roll
the next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than you has advantage if made before the start of your next turn

entries.name: Evasive Footwork
entries.trigger: when you choose to move defensively
effects: expend one Superiority Die and take the Disengage action
roll the Superiority Die and add the number rolled to your AC until the start of your next turn

entries.name: Feinting Attack
entries.trigger: when you feint against a creature within 5 feet of you
effects: expend one Superiority Die to gain advantage on your next attack roll against that target this turn
if that attack hits, add the Superiority Die to the attack damage roll

entries.name: Goading Attack
entries.trigger: when you hit a creature with an attack roll
effects: expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack damage roll
the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you until the end of your next turn

entries.name: Lunging Attack
entries.trigger: when you choose to lunge
effects: expend one Superiority Die and take the Dash action
if you move at least 5 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack as part of the Attack action this turn, add the Superiority Die to the attack damage roll

entries.name: Maneuvering Attack
entries.trigger: when you hit a creature with an attack roll
effects: expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack damage roll
choose a willing creature who can see or hear you; that creature can use its Reaction to move up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks from the target of your attack

entries.name: Menacing Attack
entries.trigger: when you hit a creature with an attack roll
effects: expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack damage roll
the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Frightened condition until the end of your next turn

entries.name: Parry
entries.trigger: when another creature damages you with a melee attack roll
effects: expend one Superiority Die and reduce the damage by the number you roll on the Superiority Die plus your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice)

entries.name: Precision Attack
entries.trigger: when you miss with an attack roll
effects: expend one Superiority Die, roll it, and add it to the attack roll, potentially causing the attack to hit

entries.name: Pushing Attack
entries.trigger: when you hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike
effects: expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack damage roll
if the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet directly away from you

entries.name: Rally
entries.trigger: when you bolster a companion
effects: expend one Superiority Die and choose an ally within 30 feet who can see or hear you
the ally gains Temporary Hit Points equal to the Superiority Die roll plus half your Fighter level (round down)

entries.name: Riposte
entries.trigger: when a creature misses you with a melee attack roll
effects: expend one Superiority Die to make a melee attack roll with a weapon or an Unarmed Strike against the creature
if you hit, add the Superiority Die to the attack damage roll

entries.name: Sweeping Attack
entries.trigger: when you hit a creature with a melee attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike
effects: expend one Superiority Die to attempt to damage another creature
choose another creature within 5 feet of the original target and within your reach
if the original attack roll would hit the second creature, it takes damage equal to the Superiority Die roll
the damage is of the same type dealt by the original attack

entries.name: Tactical Assessment
entries.trigger: when you make an Intelligence (History or Investigation) check or a Wisdom (Insight) check
effects: expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the ability check

entries.name: Trip Attack
entries.trigger: when you hit a creature with an attack roll using a weapon or an Unarmed Strike
effects: expend one Superiority Die and add the die to the attack damage roll
if the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition

notes: All maneuvers require expending one Superiority Die unless otherwise noted.
